claim.text: The style profiles of three popular LLMs when they are assigned different socio-demographic personas are different from those of humans from the same socio-demographic groups.
claim.exact_quote: Although LLMs’ writing styles are not drastically different from those of humans from the same socio-demographic groups, some distinct differences can be observed.

evidence.evidence_text: The style profiles of three popular LLMs when they are assigned different socio-demographic personas are different from those of humans from the same socio-demographic groups.
evidence.exact_quote: Different personas in Reddit indeed exhibit different writing styles. Our observation is that there are clear differences of writing styles across different personas in the same category.

evaluation.key_limitations: The study only looked at a limited number of LLMs, personas, and human-written texts.

claim.text: Different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.
claim.location: Trait of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: Different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.

evidence.evidence_text: Different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.
evidence.location: Traits of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: We identify these traits closely to understand how they can be used and how well they can copy the style of discussions on sites like Reddit.

evidence.evidence_text: Different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.
evidence.limitations: Based on a limited set of personas and situations
evidence.location: Trait of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: Based on our observations with the three LLMs (i.e., Llama, Mistral, and GPT) as discussed above, we find that different LLMs have their own special traits that make them suitable for different situations and audiences.

evaluation.key_limitations: The study only looked at a limited number of LLMs, situations, and audiences.

claim.text: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas but is versatile.
claim.location: Trait of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas but is versatile.

evidence.evidence_text: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas but is versatile.
evidence.limitations: May not generalize to all possible personas
evidence.location: Trait of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: GPT demonstrates a balanced mix of styles, especially analytical and professional, across different personas but is versatile, potentially appealing to audiences that value both critical analysis and professional discourse.

evaluation.key_limitations: The study only looked at a limited number of personas and situations.

claim.text: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas and often divergent from Reddit.
claim.location: Trait of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
claim.exact_quote: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas and often divergent from Reddit.

evidence.evidence_text: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas and often divergent from Reddit.
evidence.limitations: May not generalize to all possible personas
evidence.location: Trait of Different LLMs’ Writing Styles
evidence.exact_quote: Mistral consistently uses a style that is quite different across various personas and often divergent from Reddit, indicating a distinct professional pattern.

evaluation.key_limitations: The study only looked at a limited number of personas and situations.
